trait.name: Feline Agility
text: When Flask of Wine moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, Flask of Wine can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Flask of Wine makes two attacks with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
